--- title: Feature Selection keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "Class that would train a `LightGBM` model on a dataset and select set of features that are actually relevant to the task." ---

Feature Selection Using Null Importance¶

class FeatureSelection[source]

FeatureSelection(model_args:Dict[KT, VT], threshold:int=3)

Usage¶

data = load_boston()
X = pd.DataFrame(data['data'], columns=data['feature_names'])
y = pd.Series(data['target'])

model_args = {
    'num_boost_round': 300,
    'objective': 'regression',
    'learning_rate': 0.1,
    'num_leaves': 31,
    'nthread': -1,
    'verbosity': -1,
    'seed': 41
}

print(f'Feature list: {X.columns.tolist()}')
fs = FeatureSelection(model_args)
selected_features = fs.select_features(X, y)
print(f'Selected features: {selected_features}')

Feature list: ['CRIM', 'ZN', 'INDUS', 'CHAS', 'NOX', 'RM', 'AGE', 'DIS', 'RAD', 'TAX', 'PTRATIO', 'B', 'LSTAT']
Selected features: ['AGE', 'B', 'CHAS', 'CRIM', 'DIS', 'INDUS', 'LSTAT', 'NOX', 'PTRATIO', 'RAD', 'RM', 'TAX', 'ZN']

fs.ratio_df
